hero.title: Easy Smart Carbon Offsetting
hero.subtitle: AKHDAR is a Saudi climate tech startup that helps businesses and individuals offset their carbon footprint using smart, technology-driven solutions.

statement.title: Akhdar Sustainability Statement
statement.desc: At AKHDAR, we recognize that protecting and restoring nature is essential for mitigating climate change. Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030 and 2060 set ambitious targets for reducing emissions and enhancing sustainability, and we are committed to driving this transformation. By enabling businesses to reduce, offset, and track their carbon footprint, AKHDAR supports a science-based carbon reduction pathway aligned with the Paris Agreement and the unsustainable Development Goals (SDGs) for a positive environmental and social impact.

missionvision.title: Our Mission & Vision
missionvision.desc: AKHDAR's mission is to become Saudi Arabia's leading carbon offset aggregator, helping businesses, organizations, and individuals take meaningful climate action.
